thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Michael Thrasher

author: Michael Thrasher
title: Michael Thrasher
text: Up dates drivers that no other software updates had avg driver update was alright but driver support gets all your drivers fantastic piece of software I was really impressed with my mother board drivers being updated avg never did my gigabyte motherboard,impressive
